dmca.title: [ThePlanet-C2590282P] Stolen Website/Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2007 10:34 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanet-C2590282P] Stolen Website/Copyright Infringement

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Stolen Website/Copyright Infringement Added by system at Monday, Jan 15 2007
04:25 pm
X-MailFrom: matt@revolvercreative.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Mon Jan 15 16:25:13 2007

Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Mon, 15 Jan 2007 16:21:38 -0600

 (Exim)

helo=[10.0.1.3])

Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.2)
To: admins@theplanet.com,
 abuse@theplanet.com,
 ph76@msn.com,
 piletas@grupopiletas.com,
 info@ph76.com,
 copyright@theplanet.com,

Message-Id: <A5A44A42-4529-442D-BC1C-9A005ABBE410@revolvercreative.com>
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=Apple-Mail-3--533557905
From: Matthew Fordham <matt@revolvercreative.com>
Subject: Stolen Website/Copyright Infringement
Date: Mon, 15 Jan 2007 14:21:26 -0800
X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.2)
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 15 Jan 2007 22:21:38.0425 (UTC) FILETIME=[86455E90:01C738F3] 

 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
Hello, 
 
I am writing to inform you that the following website has been   
stolen: http://www.grupopiletas.com, which is administered, hosted,   
or stolen by you. I designed this site and the original can be seen   
here: http://www.revolvercreative.com/archive/2004/flash.html 
 
You are in violation of copyright laws and are legally liable to   
damages due to theft of intellectual property. I am asking you to   
please take down the website. I worked very hard on creating it and   
do not appreciate being robbed. 
 
Thank you,
Matthew Fordham. 
 
Matthew Fordham
Music Production & Interactive Design
 >> Seattle, WA
 >> 206.219.3795
 >> http://www.revolvercreative.com
